title: Colón to Ponzano Tapas Walk
knownFor: A charming walk through Madrid's upscale Chamberí district, ending at the trendy Calle de Ponzano—famous for its tapas bars and local atmosphere. Perfect for experiencing the 'pijo' side of Madrid with plenty of stops for drinks and Spanish cuisine.
route: Plaza de Colón → Alonso Martínez → Bilbao → Plaza de Olavide → Calle de Ponzano (tapas and drinks)
